name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Angular Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full stack development, specializing in **Angular**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**. Proven expertise in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Possesses a strong understanding of **Agile** methodologies and emphasizes **Clean Code** practices to ensure maintainable, high-quality software. Experienced in comprehensive testing to enhance software reliability.

Additionally, skilled in **React**, **Next.js**, and backend frameworks like **Node.js** and **FastAPI**. Proficient in deploying cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, utilizing microservices, and implementing CI/CD pipelines for efficient delivery. Knowledgeable in compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS, coupled with a robust background in AI/ML-driven development, focusing on model training and orchestration tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
